title: Relationship Theory on Finding the Right Time For Hard Conversations
description: Tom Bilyeu and Lisa Bilyeu (@lisabilyeu) dive into topics such as: * When to find the best time to have a hard conversation with your spouse. * How to share each others day which without it becoming a one-sided conversation. * How to encourage your partner to be more verbal. * How to effectively become better business partners with your spouse. * Finding the best tactics to reach out to your significant others family members. *And much more... Tom Bilyeu is the co-founder of 2014 Inc. 500 company Quest Nutrition — a unicorn startup valued at over $1 billion — and the co-founder and host of Impact Theory. Impact Theory is a first-of-its-kind company designed to facilitate global change through the incubation of mission-based businesses and the cultivation of empowering content. Every piece of content Impact Theory creates is meant to underscore the company mission to free people from The Matrix and help them unlock their true potential. Impact Theory exists to inspire the next generation of game-changing companies and creators that will make a true and lasting impact on the world.
